entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
